= axios
:toc: left
:toclevels: 8
:url-website: https://axios-http.com/
:url-repo: https://github.com/axios/axios

{url-website}[[website\]]
{url-repo}[[repo\]]

== Installation

[source,bash]
----
pnpm install axios
----

[source,html]
----
<script src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/axios/dist/axios.min.js"></script>
----

or

[source,html]
----
<script src="https://unpkg.com/axios/dist/axios.min.js"></script>
----
